籤詩版本二:
Umgca wegolide ulinganisa intliziyo yakho, akukho kuncipha, akukho ukwanda, akukho bunzima
Unentliziyo ethe tye kubo bonke ubomi bakhe, kwaye amanqaku akhe onke aqaqambile kwaye ubugcisa bakhe buqaqambile.UBei ubhekisa kwiBeizi njengobutyebi. UBei unezixhobo.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele ingqondo ezolile kwaye ithe tye.
Yonke into izinzile kwaye ayinangozi.
解曰: Uxolo lwengqondo kunye nengqibelelo. Ekugqibeleni, uxolo noxolo. Landela nje umsebenzi wakho. Ihlabathi liseluxolweni.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing uvavanya uDouer
UDou Yanshan wenza izenzo ezilungileyo kwaye waqokelela isidima, waza wazala oonyana abahlanu, bonke abaphumeleleyo. UThixo wayefuna ukuvavanya omnye woonyana bakhe, uDou Yi, wathumela umoya wegolide owawuziguqule njengentombazana ukuba uhende uDou Yi, kodwa uDou Yi akazange ashukume.Emva koko, uDou Yi wayibona le ntombazana ijika yaba sisibane segolide yaza yangena ngaphantsi komhlaba, yemba ilitye elimnyama. umhlaba kwaye wafumana ingot yegolide.
(Eli bali sisikweko seemvakalelo zikaDou Yi, hayi kwisihendo sesondo.)
聖意: Ekhaya → Uzikhusele → Funa ubutyebi → Yiba nobulumko xa uthengiselana → Umtshato uzinzile → Hlanganisa iLiujia → Amadoda ahamba ngeenyawo → Abe nemibungu yamaShintian → Imfuyo ezinzileyo → Fumana abantu abaseluxolweni → Libazise ukumangalelwa → Ukufudukela kwelinye ilizwe → Gcina impahla elahlekileyo → Jonga ukugula → ukubona ukugula → → flat
